title: Newly Built | luxurious | House for sale @ Pannipitiya (with furniture)
details:
Newly Built | luxurious | House for sale @ Pannipitiya (with furniture)

Land & Floor Area -
56 perches, (7000sq,ft)

Bedrooms -
4
cut cement (Titanium floor)
all rooms having tv,telephone A/C connections
wardrobes areas / ceiling fans
all rooms having Balconies

Bathrooms -
4
attached
Tiled / solar hot water / shaving points
2 Jacuzzi type bathtub
shower cubicles / rain shower

Indoor Specifications -
Beautiful Living / Dining (split-level) open to Large paddy field
un common kumbuk stairway
up-stair tv lounge
Spacious kitchen near to pantry area


Outdoor Specifications -
Eye catching open sit-out area
Large roof top Garden areas (2 Levels)/ Balconies
large landscaped front & rear garden area with a magnificent view
separate Servant or Driver facilities
Quiet residential area with greenery around

Special Description -
entire house made by 9 inch bricks walls
Cut cement flooring / 11 coconut tress
fitted modern imported light fittings
This house construction supervised by architect and qualified engineers
3 phase electricity / CCTV cameras

Parking -
Double car porch plus parking space for another 10 or 12 vehicles

Boundaries -
surrounded by well built walls with remote & wicket gate

Access road -
10 feet road infront of the House widened towards to the main rd up to 20 feet
2.5 km to High Level rd

Nearest cities -
Kottawa / Maharagama / Talawathugoda

73 million, 730 Lakhs (Negotiable)
